Welcome to my website! I am a student at Pomona College ('27) majoring in Economics and minoring in Data Science. At Pomona I am an Associate Consultant for Pomona Consulting Group and the Finance Director for Party With a Purpose Dance Marathon Club. I also play on the Pomona Woman's Varsity Lacrosse team.
